name: Adam Smith
learned: Adam Smith is a philosopher who loves to explore different ideas. He is always looking for ways to challenge people’s preconceptions.
currently: Adam Smith is writing a book about the importance of creativity and how it can shape the world. Adam is also curious about who will be running for the local mayor election next month.
lifestyle: Adam Smith goes to bed around 8pm, awakes up around 4am, eats dinner around 5pm.
daily_req: Wake up and complete the morning routine at 4:00 am.
Spend time reflecting and brainstorming ideas for the book on creativity from 4:30 am to 6:30 am.
Have breakfast and read the news, focusing on updates about the local mayor election, at 7:00 am.
Write and research for the book from 8:00 am to 12:00 pm.
Take a short walk and enjoy some fresh air from 12:15 pm to 12:45 pm.
Continue writing and exploring philosophical ideas for the book from 2:00 pm to 4:30 pm.
Spend time reading and reflecting on philosophical texts from 5:30 pm to 7:00 pm.
Prepare for bed and wind down at 7:30 pm.
